snippet: Debunked by scientists as a shimmering mirage, the “water car” has received a broad and serious embrace.
abstract: Claim by Agha Waqar Ahmad, a Pakistani engineer, that he could run a car on water is debunked by established scientists, saying it violates the laws of physics; across Pakistan, where crippling electricity cuts have left millions without power and where there is hunger for tales of homegrown glory, the shimmering mirage of a 'water car' has received a broad and serious embrace.
lead_paragraph: Debunked by scientists as a shimmering mirage, the “water car” has received a broad and serious embrace.

headline.seo: Boast of Water-Run Car Thrills Pakistan
headline.main: Craving Energy and Glory, Pakistan Revels in Boast of Water-Run Car
headline.print_headline: Craving Energy and Glory, Pakistan Revels in Boast of Water-Run Car
